name: 施陽正
objective:
本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
The main target of this course is to intoduce mathematical methods ot engineering applications; the course will cover areas in differential equations and vecto calculus. This course will also train students in applying mathematics to engineering calculations and research, such as unmerical methods and statistical methods.
schedule:
週次　　章節內容
1　　■ Reviews
■ Basic Concepts and Ideas
■ Geometrical Meaning of y’=f(x, y)
■ Separable Differential Eq
2　　■ Modeling: Separable Eq. 
■ Homogenous Linear Eq. of 2nd Order with Constant Coefficients
■ Euler-Cauchy Eq.
3　　■ Non-homogenous Equations
■ Solution by Undetermined Coefficients

4　　■ Nonhomogeous Linear ODEs
■ Power Series Method
■ Theory of the Power Series Method
5　　■ Legendre’s Equation  
■ Legendre Polynomials Pn(x)
 6　　■第一次期中考(10/19-10/23)

■ Unit Step Function

■ Convolution. Integral Eq.
■ Matrices, Vectors, Matrix Multiplication
9　　■ Linear Systems of Eqs.; Gauss Elimination

11　　■ Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors

12　　■ 第二次期中考(11/30-12/4)

18　　期末考
scorePolicy:

擇優兩次定為期中成績(50%)、期末成績(50%)
